interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Nevermind " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " The Price of Experience " .

progression.synopsis: Sensei returns home, finding things to be much different. While he struggles to think clearly, he wanders around, looking for the girls who were there. He searches the living room, Ami's room, and the bathroom before deciding to head to bed. While he sleeps, there is an opportunity to tell another story. In addition to the God of Light and God of Wires , there is a third god, one without either light or wires. However, nothing can be said about this one. Instead, the narrator muses over how different other perspectives can be to their own; The flow of time, events, and even other people's personalities can all appear different depending on who you ask, so itâ€™s good to keep an open mind. Sensei then wakes up, ready to survive and grow.
trivia: Each choice Sensei has to "survive" is encoded in hexadecimal. Translations for these choices can be found below: "61 6d 69" - Ami ""6d 61 79 61" - Maya "61 79 61 6e 65" - Ayane "68 6f 70 65" - HOPE "73 61 6b 69" - Saki "73 65 6c 65 62 75 73" - Selebus "73 63 68 6f 6f 6c" - School "68 69 6d 61 77 61 72 69" - Himawari "6b 61 6f 72 69" - Kaori "66 6c 6f 6f 72 20 32" - Floor 2 "73 65 6e 73 65 69" - Sensei "61 6d 69 6f 6b 61 79 20" - amiokay "74" - T "67 6f 20 62 61 63 6b" - Go back
The game will inform you that your affection with "GOD" has been reset to 0.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .18p2.
